channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiMail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiMail

item.title: CVE-2021-36166|2024-08-04T00:47:43.820Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortimail
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in FortiMail before 7.0.1 may allow a remote attacker to efficiently guess one administrative account's authentication token by means of the observation of certain system's properties.
